event: Earliest human presence in present-day Belize
Early Maya communities develop agriculture and villages
Classic Maya civilization flourishes with major cities and temples
Collapse of Classic Maya city-states in the lowlands
Spanish explorers reach the Belizean coast
English settlers establish logging camps along the coast
British logwood and mahogany trade expands inland
Battle of St. Georgeâ€™s Caye secures British control
British Honduras becomes a formal British colony
Belize gains independence from the United Kingdom
